## Description {#details}

This class evaluates the compare condition by matching it against the condition of loop latch.

If there is a match we assume a true value for the condition while building <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> nodes.

Definition at line 4949 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/scalarevolution-cpp">ScalarEvolution.cpp</a>.
